title: SET_HELI_BLADES_SPEED
content:
0xFD280B4D7F3ABC4D0x5C7D4EA9// SetHeliBladesSpeed
void SET_HELI_BLADES_SPEED(Vehicle vehicle, float speed);Parameters:vehicle: The helicopter or the planespeed: Desired blade rotation speed from 0.0 to 1.0Despite its name, this works on Helicopters and Planes.Sets the speed of the helicopter blades in percentage of the full speed.
codeBlocks:
// SetHeliBladesSpeed
void SET_HELI_BLADES_SPEED(Vehicle vehicle, float speed);

local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId(), false)
-- Example usage for SET_HELI_BLADES_SPEED
SetHeliBladesSpeed(vehicle, 0.0)
